description: Love smoky flavours? Look no further than this vegetarian jerk eggplant recipe served with a smoky chickpea puree and pickled onion and capsicum salsa.
keywords: Jerk Eggplant With Smoky Chickpea Puree
name: Jerk Eggplant With Smoky Chickpea Puree Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Spoon puree over a serving platter, top with eggplant, then spoon over pickled onion mixture. Sprinkle with paprika and serve with extra coriander leaves.
